title: John Hodgman on The Avengers: Infinity War
itunes:title: John Hodgman on The Avengers: Infinity War
description:
Chuck was in NY with some studio time, so he decided to get his pal John Hodgman back for a conversation that spanned horror movies, comic books and John's pick Avengers: Infinity War.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
